basic.floral_language:
Ornamental Cucumis sativus 
Floriography: gentle, sunny, active
Has juicy fruits, fresh green, the plant is shorter than regular cucumber, very good ornamental values and edibility. 
Likes sunshine, but shade properly under summer strong sunlight, fruit setting 1-2 weeks after flowering for 1-2 months.
basic.blooming: Ornamental fruit and vegetable plants, planted year around, fruits 2-3 weeks after flowering, fruiting period 1-2 months
basic.color: Flower color yellow, fruit color emerald green

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 5.5-6.8
maintenance.watering: Need a lot of water, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Like fertilizer, dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
